config.title: Header Style 06

variables.menu_drop_font: 400 12px/1.35 Rajdhani, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.menu_font: 500 14px/1.35 Montserrat, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif
variables.vermenu_font: 500 12px/1.35 Rajdhani, Helvetica Neue, Verdana, Arial, sans-serif

config.layout_xml:
<body> <referenceContainer name="header.container" htmlClass="page-header header-style-06" /> <referenceContainer name="header-container-inner"> <container name="header-top" htmlId="header-top" before="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-top container" /> <container name="header-bottom" htmlId="header-bottom" after="-" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-bottom" /> </referenceContainer> <referenceContainer name="header.panel"> <container name="header-panel-row" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="header-panel-row row" after="skip_to_content"> <container name="header-panel-left" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-7 col-md-10 header-panel-left" /> <container name="header-panel-right" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="col-sm-17 col-md-14 header-panel-right"> <container name="hp-right-top" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="hp-right-top" /> <container name="hp-right-bottom" htmlTag="div" htmlClass="hp-right-bottom header-search-wrap" /> </container> </container> </referenceContainer> <move element="header.panel" destination="header-top" />
<move element="mobi-cart-placeholder" destination="hp-right-bottom" /> <move element="top.search" destination="hp-right-bottom" before="-" /> <move element="minicart" destination="hp-right-bottom" after="-" /> <referenceContainer name="hp-right-bottom"> <container name="hprb-links" htmlTag="ul" htmlClass="hprb-links" after="top.search" /> </referenceContainer> <move element="wish-list-link-features" destination="hprb-links" /> <move element="logo" destination="header-panel-left" /> <move element="top.links.features" destination="hp-right-top" before="utilities.toggle.linkslist" /> <!--move element="utilities.toggle.linkslist" destination="hp-right-top" after="-" /-->
<referenceContainer name="hp-right-top"> <block class="Magento\Store\Block\Switcher" name="footer-switch-language" template="Magento_Store::switch/languages-style-02.phtml" /> <block class="Magento\Directory\Block\Currency" name="footer-switch-currency" template="Magento_Directory::currency-style-02.phtml" /> </referenceContainer> <referenceBlock name="utilities.sidebar.right"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">required_blocks</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="array"> <item name="getAccountPanelStyle" xsi:type="string">utilities.content</item> <item name="getHeaderWishlistStyle" xsi:type="string">wishlist-sidebar</item> <item name="getMiniCartStyle" xsi:type="string">minicart-sidebar</item> <!--item name="getLeftMenuStyle" xsi:type="string">header-links-list</item--> </argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <!--referenceBlock name="utilities.sidebar.left"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">required_blocks</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="boolean">0</argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <referenceBlock name="utilities.toggle.linkslist"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">direction</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">right</argument> </action> </referenceBlock--> <referenceBlock name="header-contact-link" remove="true" /> <referenceBlock name="top.links"> <action method="setData"> <argument name="name" xsi:type="string">css_class</argument> <argument name="value" xsi:type="string">header links visible-xs</argument> </action> </referenceBlock> <move element="catalog.topnav" destination="header-bottom" before="-" />
<move element="store-menu-placeholder" destination="store.menu" /> </body>
